update contract
contract_address = #{contractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_path = #{contractPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_status = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BINARY},
deploy_time = #{deployTime,jdbcType=BINARY},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BINARY},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
